name: AndroidX
summary: Development environment for Android Jetpack extension libraries under the androidx namespace. Synchronized with Android Jetpack's primary development branch on AOSP.

name: Compose Multiplatform
summary: Compose Multiplatform, a modern UI framework for Kotlin that makes building performant and beautiful user interfaces easy and enjoyable.

name: Accompanist
summary: A collection of extension libraries for Jetpack Compose

name: Sora Editor
summary: A cool code editor library on Android with syntax-highlighting and auto-completion. (aka CodeEditor)

name: zxing
summary: ZXing ("Zebra Crossing") barcode scanning library for Java, Android

name: Ktor
summary: Framework for quickly creating connected applications in Kotlin with minimal effort

name: XLog
summary: Android logger, pretty, powerful and flexible, log to everywhere, save to file, all you want is here.

name: coil
summary: Image loading for Android backed by Kotlin Coroutines.
